name: To the BOX
description:
To the BOX is a friendly intellectual platform 2D game for everyone. Skillfully jump on the shelves to complete the level and eat the delicious red treats. Speedruns are welcome!

How to play

Control the green square with the keyboard arrows or by tapping the screen. Tap on the left or right side of the screen - jump left and right, respectively, long tap - for a jump followed by a slide.

Easy start
  1. Choose your favorite color for the player!
  2. Turn on the sound for a good feeling!
  3. Click on a player to start the game!
    4. *** Win and donate! ***

Secret note: there are 21 red squares and a speedrun in less than 1 minute.

Credits

Game by Ivan Fedotov.
